title: Yoshida no Time Slip Fumai-kou
original_name: 吉田のタイムスリップ不昧公
sinopse: A Matsue City collaboration anime with Eagle Talon. A young Matsudaira Harusato (aka Matsudaira Fumai) who was once the ruled of Matsue time slips to the present. Yoshida ends up explaining Fumai's achievements to Fumai himself.
